error.message: Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_Function_Function: since 1.12 (to be removed in 2.0)
Using an instance of "Twig_Function_Function" for function "link" is deprecated since version 1.21. Use \Twig_SimpleFunction instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to menu_twig.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
